title: Engine does not start (starter motor runs, no ignition sign)
title_ko: 시동 불가(스타터 동작, 점화 징후 없음)
title_en: Engine does not start (starter motor runs, no ignition sign)

nodes.text_en: Is there a strong spark at the spark plug?
Is the air filter element blocked?
Is the fuel pump operating?
Is the injector working normally?
Is fuel pressure normal?
Is cylinder pressure normal?
Check the ignition system (spark plug, coil, wiring).
actions_en: Inspect spark plug gap and ignition coil wiring.
actions_ko: 스파크 플러그 간극과 점화 코일 배선을 점검한다.
actions: Inspect spark plug gap and ignition coil wiring.

nodes.text_en: Clean or replace the air filter element.
actions_en: Clean or replace the air filter element.
actions: Clean or replace the air filter element.

nodes.text_en: Check the fuel pump and wiring.
actions_en: Verify fuel pump operation and connectors.
actions_ko: 연료 펌프 작동 및 커넥터를 확인한다.
actions: Verify fuel pump operation and connectors.

nodes.text_en: Inspect the injector and its wiring.
actions_en: Check injector sound and coil resistance.
actions: Check injector sound and coil resistance.

nodes.text_en: Inspect the fuel pump, filter screen, and fuel supply.
nodes.text_ko: 연료 펌프, 필터 스크린, 연료 공급을 점검한다.
actions_en: Check fuel pump pressure and filter screen.
actions_ko: 연료 펌프 압력과 필터 스크린을 점검한다.
actions: Check fuel pump pressure and filter screen.

nodes.text_en: Check the three-in-one sensor and water/oil shared sensor.
actions_en: Inspect three-in-one sensor and water/oil shared sensor.
actions: Inspect three-in-one sensor and water/oil shared sensor.

nodes.text_en: Cylinder pressure is low.
actions_en: Inspect mechanical condition and compression.
actions: Inspect mechanical condition and compression.

title: Engine does not start (has ignition signs)
title_en: Engine does not start (has ignition signs)

nodes.text_en: Is there a diagnostic fault code?
Does the engine respond when the throttle is opened?
Is the idle speed control valve and wiring normal?
nodes.text_ko: 아이들 스피드 컨트롤 밸브와 배선이 정상입니까?

nodes.text_en: Are the air filter outlet pipe and hoses (tank vent, canister) blocked?
nodes.text_ko: 에어 필터 배출 파이프/호스(탱크 벤트, 캐니스터)가 막혀 있습니까?

nodes.text_en: Is high-voltage spark normal?
Is ignition timing normal?
Is fuel sufficient and fuel system wiring intact?
nodes.text_ko: 연료가 충분하고 연료 시스템 배선이 정상입니까?

nodes.text_en: Check EFI parts according to the fault code.
nodes.text_ko: 고장 코드에 따라 EFI 부품을 점검한다.
actions_en: Inspect the indicated EFI components.
actions: Inspect the indicated EFI components.

nodes.text_en: Repair or replace the idle speed control valve and wiring.
nodes.text_ko: 아이들 스피드 컨트롤 밸브/배선을 수리 또는 교체한다.
actions_en: Inspect idle speed control valve and wiring.
actions_ko: 아이들 스피드 컨트롤 밸브와 배선을 점검한다.
actions: Inspect idle speed control valve and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Clear blockages in intake and vent hoses.
nodes.text_ko: 흡기 및 벤트 호스의 막힘을 제거한다.
actions_en: Check air filter outlet pipe and vent hoses.
actions_ko: 에어 필터 배출 파이프와 벤트 호스를 점검한다.
actions: Check air filter outlet pipe and vent hoses.

nodes.text_en: Inspect ignition coil and spark plug.
actions_en: Inspect ignition coil and spark plug condition.
actions_ko: 점화 코일과 스파크 플러그 상태를 점검한다.
actions: Inspect ignition coil and spark plug condition.

nodes.text_en: Adjust ignition timing at service.
actions_en: Adjust ignition timing with diagnostic tools.
actions: Adjust ignition timing with diagnostic tools.

nodes.text_en: Check three-in-one sensor and water/oil shared sensor.
actions_en: Inspect sensors and wiring.
actions: Inspect sensors and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Check fuel pump, fuse, and wiring.
actions_en: Inspect fuel pump power and wiring continuity.
actions_ko: 연료 펌프 전원과 배선 단선 여부를 점검한다.
actions: Inspect fuel pump power and wiring continuity.

nodes.text_en: Is gasoline sufficient and clean (no water separation)?
nodes.text_ko: 연료가 충분하고 수분 분리 없이 깨끗합니까?

nodes.text_en: Does fuel cutoff speed reach within 3 seconds at full neutral throttle?
nodes.text_ko: 중립 풀스로틀 시 3초 내 연료 차단 속도에 도달합니까?

nodes.text_en: Is high-pressure fuel pipe pressure 290-310 kPa?
Is battery voltage above 13V when stopped?
Is the dump switch wiring normal?
Is the ignition coil / high-voltage line connection normal?
Refuel with clean gasoline.
actions_en: Drain contaminated fuel and refill.
actions: Drain contaminated fuel and refill.

nodes.text_en: Check fuel system and pressure.
actions_en: Inspect fuel pressure and delivery.
actions: Inspect fuel pressure and delivery.

nodes.text_en: Check fuel pump or filter.
actions_en: Inspect fuel pump and filter screen.
actions: Inspect fuel pump and filter screen.

nodes.text_en: Charge or replace the battery and check rectifier.
actions_en: Check battery, rectifier, and magneto.
actions: Check battery, rectifier, and magneto.

nodes.text_en: Replace the dump switch.
actions_en: Replace dump switch and verify wiring.
actions: Replace dump switch and verify wiring.

nodes.text_en: Inspect spark plug and ignition coil.
actions_en: Check spark plug condition and coil terminals.
actions_ko: 스파크 플러그 상태와 코일 단자를 점검한다.
actions: Check spark plug condition and coil terminals.

nodes.text_en: Repair or replace the high-voltage line or ignition coil.
nodes.text_ko: 고전압 라인 또는 점화 코일을 수리/교체한다.
actions_en: Repair or replace high-voltage line.
actions: Repair or replace high-voltage line.

nodes.text_en: Are EFI sensor connectors loose?
Is there a fault code?
Is there a recent power outage or reset needed?
Reconnect EFI sensor connectors.
actions_en: Reseat EFI sensor connectors.
actions: Reseat EFI sensor connectors.

nodes.text_en: Inspect EFI parts according to the fault code.
nodes.text_ko: 고장 코드에 따라 EFI 부품을 점검한다.
actions_en: Inspect the indicated EFI components and wiring.
actions: Inspect the indicated EFI components and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Reset the EFI system.
actions_en: Perform EFI system reset procedure.
actions: Perform EFI system reset procedure.

nodes.text_en: Check throttle body and sensor leakage.
nodes.text_ko: 스로틀 바디 및 센서 누설을 점검한다.
actions_en: Inspect throttle body leakage and TPS.
actions: Inspect throttle body leakage and TPS.

nodes.text_en: Is the EFI fault light on?
Does the starting relay respond?
Does the starter motor work when directly powered?
nodes.text_ko: 직결 전원 시 스타터 모터가 작동합니까?

nodes.text_en: Check flameout switch and related wiring.
nodes.text_ko: 킬 스위치 및 관련 배선을 점검한다.
actions_en: Inspect right handle flameout switch.
actions: Inspect right handle flameout switch.

nodes.text_en: Replace the starting relay.
actions_en: Replace starting relay.
actions: Replace starting relay.

nodes.text_en: Check brake switch or flameout switch.
nodes.text_ko: 브레이크 스위치 또는 킬 스위치를 점검한다.
actions_en: Inspect brake switch and flameout switch.
actions: Inspect brake switch and flameout switch.

nodes.text_en: Replace or repair the starter motor and cable.
actions_en: Repair starter motor cable or replace motor.
actions_ko: 스타터 모터 케이블을 수리하거나 모터를 교체한다.
actions: Repair starter motor cable or replace motor.

nodes.text_en: Is engine performance poor, idle unstable, or fuel consumption high?
nodes.text_ko: 출력이 저하되고 아이들이 불안정하거나 연비가 나쁩니까?

nodes.text_en: Is oxygen sensor heater resistance within spec?
Is the sensor tip color normal (light gray)?
Symptoms do not match oxygen sensor issue.
nodes.text_ko: 증상이 산소 센서 문제와 일치하지 않습니다.
actions_en: Check other EFI components.
actions: Check other EFI components.

nodes.text_en: Replace the oxygen sensor.
actions_en: Replace oxygen sensor if resistance is out of spec.
actions_ko: 저항이 규격 밖이면 산소 센서를 교체한다.
actions: Replace oxygen sensor if resistance is out of spec.

nodes.text_en: Oxygen sensor appears normal.
actions_en: Inspect wiring and other related sensors.
actions: Inspect wiring and other related sensors.

nodes.text_en: Sensor tip shows abnormal color or deposits.
actions_en: Clean deposits or replace the sensor.
actions: Clean deposits or replace the sensor.

nodes.text_en: Is spark plug gap within spec?
Is the plug electrode clean and dry?
Is the ignition coil wiring and cap secure?
nodes.text_ko: 점화 코일 배선/캡이 확실히 연결되어 있습니까?

nodes.text_en: Is battery voltage sufficient?
Adjust or replace the spark plug.
actions_en: Set plug gap to spec or replace plug.
actions: Set plug gap to spec or replace plug.

nodes.text_en: Clean or replace the spark plug.
actions_en: Remove deposits and dry the plug.
actions: Remove deposits and dry the plug.

nodes.text_en: Repair the ignition coil wiring or cap.
actions_en: Secure coil cap and repair wiring.
actions: Secure coil cap and repair wiring.

nodes.text_en: Replace the ignition coil if needed.
actions_en: Inspect coil and replace if faulty.
actions: Inspect coil and replace if faulty.

nodes.text_en: Charge or replace the battery.
actions_en: Charge or replace battery.
actions: Charge or replace battery.

nodes.text_en: Is the engine stalling or hard to start, especially cold?
nodes.text_ko: 특히 냉간에서 시동이 어렵거나 시동이 꺼집니까?

nodes.text_en: Is idle speed unstable or intermittent during acceleration?
nodes.text_ko: 아이들 속도가 불안정하거나 가속 시 간헐적 떨림이 있습니까?

nodes.text_en: Is power insufficient or acceleration poor?
Inspect throttle body, return spring, and idle adjustment.
nodes.text_ko: 스로틀 바디, 리턴 스프링, 아이들 조정 부품을 점검한다.
actions_en: Clean throttle body and adjust idle speed.
actions_ko: 스로틀 바디를 청소하고 아이들 속도를 조정한다.
actions: Clean throttle body and adjust idle speed.

nodes.text_en: Check throttle body sensors and wiring.
actions_en: Inspect throttle position sensor and wiring.
actions: Inspect throttle position sensor and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Inspect intake leaks and throttle body cleanliness.
nodes.text_ko: 흡기 누설 및 스로틀 바디 청결 상태를 점검한다.
actions_en: Check intake leaks and clean throttle body.
actions_ko: 흡기 누설을 점검하고 스로틀 바디를 청소한다.
actions: Check intake leaks and clean throttle body.

nodes.text_en: Symptoms do not match throttle body failure.
nodes.text_ko: 증상이 스로틀 바디 문제와 일치하지 않습니다.
actions_en: Check other engine systems.
actions: Check other engine systems.

nodes.text_en: Is starting difficult or engine power weak?
Is fuel pump running when key is on?
nodes.text_ko: 키 ON 시 연료 펌프가 작동합니까?

nodes.text_en: Is fuel pressure within spec?
Symptoms do not match fuel pump issue.
nodes.text_ko: 증상이 연료 펌프 문제와 일치하지 않습니다.
actions_en: Check other fuel system components.
actions: Check other fuel system components.

nodes.text_en: Check fuel pump power and wiring.
nodes.text_ko: 연료 펌프 전원 및 배선을 점검한다.
actions_en: Inspect pump relay, fuse, and wiring.
actions: Inspect pump relay, fuse, and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Fuel pump appears normal.
actions_en: Inspect injector and fuel filter.
actions: Inspect injector and fuel filter.

nodes.text_en: Fuel pressure out of spec.
actions_en: Replace fuel pump or pressure regulator.
actions: Replace fuel pump or pressure regulator.

nodes.text_en: Is engine unstable or weak at idle?
Is injector clicking sound rhythmic?
Is injector coil resistance within spec?
Symptoms do not match injector issue.
actions_en: Check other fuel components.
actions: Check other fuel components.

nodes.text_en: Inspect injector and wiring.
actions_en: Check injector connector and wiring.
actions: Check injector connector and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Injector appears normal.
actions_en: Inspect fuel pressure and air intake.
actions: Inspect fuel pressure and air intake.

nodes.text_en: Replace the injector.
actions_en: Replace injector if resistance is out of spec.
actions: Replace injector if resistance is out of spec.

nodes.text_en: Is idle poor or air-fuel ratio incorrect?
Is canister valve resistance within spec?
Symptoms do not match canister valve issue.
nodes.text_ko: 증상이 캐니스터 밸브 문제와 일치하지 않습니다.
actions_en: Check other intake components.
actions: Check other intake components.

nodes.text_en: Canister valve appears normal.
actions_en: Inspect hoses and wiring.
actions: Inspect hoses and wiring.

nodes.text_en: Replace canister solenoid valve.
actions_en: Replace canister solenoid valve if out of spec.
actions_ko: 규격 밖이면 캐니스터 솔레노이드 밸브를 교체한다.
actions: Replace canister solenoid valve if out of spec.

nodes.text_en: Is the battery weak or discharged?
Is charging voltage normal?
Battery condition appears normal.
actions_en: Check starter and ignition circuits.
actions: Check starter and ignition circuits.

nodes.text_en: Charge system appears normal.
actions_en: Perform battery load test.
actions: Perform battery load test.

nodes.text_en: Check rectifier and magneto.
actions_en: Inspect rectifier and stator output.
actions: Inspect rectifier and stator output.

nodes.text_en: Is the ABS warning light on?
Are sensor cables and connectors intact?
Is battery voltage normal?
ABS appears normal.
actions_en: No action required.
actions: No action required.

nodes.text_en: Repair or reconnect ABS sensor wiring.
actions_en: Inspect wheel sensor wiring and connectors.
actions: Inspect wheel sensor wiring and connectors.

nodes.text_en: Check ABS control wiring and ground points.
nodes.text_ko: ABS 제어 배선과 접지 상태를 점검한다.
actions_en: Check ABS control wiring and grounds.
actions: Check ABS control wiring and grounds.

nodes.text_en: Charge or replace the battery.
actions_en: Charge or replace battery.
actions: Charge or replace battery.
